entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
